phylo

Source: vignettes/articles/phylo.Rmd
phylo.Rmd
library(taxPPro)
library(bugphyzz)
library(purrr)
library(dplyr)

Get metaphlan tree 

tree <- getMpaTree()
tree
#> 
#> Phylogenetic tree with 26931 tips and 26929 internal nodes.
#> 
#> Tip labels:
#>   87903, 77821, 2406, 2405, 77822, 77819, ...
#> 
#> Rooted; includes branch lengths.

Import bugphyzz physiologies 

phys <- physiologies('all', remove_false = TRUE, full_source = FALSE)

Get as many species level taxids as possible 

no_propagation <- phys |> 
    map_dbl(~ {
        df <- .x[!is.na(.x$NCBI_ID),]
        mean(df$NCBI_ID %in% tree$tip.label) * 100
    }) |> 
    as.data.frame() |> 
    tibble::rownames_to_column(var = 'spreadsheet') |> 
    magrittr::set_colnames(c('spreadsheet', 'percent')) |> 
    arrange(-percent)
no_propagation
#>                              spreadsheet    percent
